subject: Throttle Not Working?
description_text:
Hello,

I have a set of prox pedals and I downloaded LeMans Ultimate and suddenly the throttle isn't working. It doesn't register at all in the Simpsonn manager but I can unplug it from the throttle port on the control box into the clutch or brake and it registers. I used it 12 hours ago and nothing has changed other than a game download. 

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Thomas Kirk,  Please make sure the pedals are properly connected to the main controller. Then, click “Offset” in the software interface and set the initial offset percentage in the pop-up window.
